verses.verse: <S%H5869>"Behold,<s%> my eye has <S%H7200>seen<s%> all <S%H241>this.<s%> My ear has <S%H8085>heard<s%> and understood <S%H995>it.<s%>
What you <S%H1847>know,<s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H5307>also.<s%> I am not inferior to you.
<S%H199>"Surely<s%> I would <S%H1696>speak<s%> to the <S%H7706>Almighty.<s%> I <S%H2654>desire<s%> to <S%H3198>reason<s%> with <S%H410>God.<s%>
<S%H199>But<s%> you are <S%H2950>forgers<s%> of <S%H8267>lies.<s%> You are all <S%H7495>physicians<s%> of no <S%H457>value.<s%>
Oh <S%H5414>that<s%> you would be <S%H2790>completely<s%> <S%H2790>silent!<s%> Then you would be <S%H2451>wise.<s%>
<S%H8085>Hear<s%> now my <S%H8433>reasoning.<s%> <S%H7181>Listen<s%> to the <S%H7379>pleadings<s%> of my <S%H8193>lips.<s%>
Will you <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H5766>unrighteously<s%> for <S%H410>God,<s%> and <S%H1696>talk<s%> deceitfully for <S%H7423>him?<s%>
Will you <S%H5375>show<s%> <S%H6440>partiality<s%> to <S%H7378>him?<s%> Will you contend for <S%H410>God?<s%>
Is it <S%H2895>good<s%> that he should search you <S%H2713>out?<s%> Or as <S%H582>one<s%> <S%H2048>deceives<s%> a <S%H2048>man,<s%> will you deceive him?
He will <S%H3198>surely<s%> <S%H3198>reprove<s%> you if you <S%H5643>secretly<s%> <S%H5375>show<s%> <S%H6440>partiality.<s%>
Shall not his <S%H7613>majesty<s%> make you <S%H1204>afraid,<s%> And his <S%H6343>dread<s%> fall on <S%H5307>you?<s%>
Your <S%H2146>memorable<s%> sayings <S%H4912>are<s%> proverbs of <S%H665>ashes,<s%> Your <S%H1354>defenses<s%> are <S%H1354>defenses<s%> of <S%H2563>clay.<s%>
"Be <S%H2790>silent,<s%> leave me <S%H1696>alone,<s%> that I may speak. Let come on me what <S%H5674>will.<s%>
Why should I <S%H5375>take<s%> my <S%H1320>flesh<s%> in my <S%H8127>teeth,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> my <S%H5315>life<s%> in my <S%H3709>hand?<s%>
<S%H2005>Behold,<s%> he will <S%H6991>kill<s%> <S%H3176>me.<s%> I have no hope. <S%H3198>Nevertheless,<s%> I will maintain my <S%H1870>ways<s%> before <S%H6440>him.<s%>
This also shall be my <S%H3444>salvation,<s%> that a <S%H2611>godless<s%> man shall not <S%H935>come<s%> before <S%H6440>him.<s%>
<S%H8085>Hear<s%> <S%H8085>diligently<s%> my <S%H4405>speech.<s%> Let my <S%H262>declaration<s%> be in your <S%H241>ears.<s%>
See <S%H6186>now,<s%> I have set my <S%H4941>cause<s%> in <S%H3045>order.<s%> I know that I am <S%H6663>righteous.<s%>
Who is he who will <S%H7378>contend<s%> with <S%H2790>me?<s%> For then would I hold my peace and give up the <S%H1478>spirit.<s%>
"Only <S%H6213>don't<s%> do <S%H8147>two<s%> things to <S%H5641>me;<s%> then I will not hide myself from your <S%H6440>face:<s%>
<S%H7368>withdraw<s%> your <S%H3709>hand<s%> <S%H7368>far<s%> from <S%H367>me;<s%> and don't let your terror make me <S%H367>afraid.<s%>
Then <S%H7121>call,<s%> and I will <S%H6030>answer;<s%> or let me <S%H1696>speak,<s%> and you answer <S%H7725>me.<s%>
How many are my <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> and <S%H2403>sins?<s%> Make me <S%H3045>know<s%> my <S%H6588>disobedience<s%> and my <S%H2403>sin.<s%>
Why <S%H5641>hide<s%> you your <S%H6440>face,<s%> and <S%H2803>hold<s%> me for your <S%H341>enemy?<s%>
Will you <S%H6206>harass<s%> a <S%H5086>driven<s%> <S%H5929>leaf?<s%> Will you <S%H7291>pursue<s%> the <S%H3002>dry<s%> <S%H7179>stubble?<s%>
For you <S%H3789>write<s%> bitter <S%H4846>things<s%> against <S%H3423>me,<s%> and make me inherit the <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> of my <S%H5271>youth:<s%>

You also <S%H7760>put<s%> my <S%H7272>feet<s%> in the <S%H5465>stocks,<s%> and <S%H8104>mark<s%> all my <S%H734>paths.<s%> You set a <S%H2707>bound<s%> to the <S%H8328>soles<s%> of my <S%H7272>feet,<s%>
though I am <S%H1086>decaying<s%> like a rotten <S%H7538>thing,<s%> like a <S%H899>garment<s%> that is <S%H6211>moth<s%> - <S%H398>eaten.<s%>
